item.g:title: Ghost Bond Glue | 1.3oz Waterproof Ghost Bond XL Working for Lace and Poly Hair Systems | Ship to the U.S. ONLY
item.g:description:
Ghost Bond XL is used for full head application. Following on from the success of our GhostBond™ Adhesive, Pro Hair Labs have refined and developed our solution to bring you GhostBond™ XL. This unique hair adhesive has been specially formulated to protect against excessive moisture or sweat and to have a melting point higher than that of regular wig adhesive solutions, keeping your hair looking cool no matter how hot it gets. GhostBond™ XL offers an elegant solution to keep your confidence high and peace of mind intact. Developed by specialist chemists to be incredibly high performance whilst still also kind to your scalp, you can’t go wrong with GhostBond™ XL.
Always run a patch test before full application.
POLY Step 1: 1 thin coating to the hair system Step 2: 4 thin coatings to the head. Put each coat on as soon as the previous coat turns clear (around 20 seconds) Step 3: After the 4th coating, wait 7 minutes and press the hair system into place. LACE Use the same steps as above only, do not apply adhesive directly to the lace. Apply to scalp only.

This brilliant and gorgeous low-ponytail hairstyle is certainly one to turn heads. Special Features: Ear-to-ear lace front for a more natural look. Flex Combs on the sides for a secure fit. Heat Friendly Fiber - High quality heat friendly fiber looks and feels like natural hair; plus it can be styled with heat tools. Cap Size – Impeccably tailored to fit smoothly and securely around the head, it’s ideal for an average head size. Please note: Keep the temperature between 90-140°C when using heat on the synthetic wigs.
This wig can withstand heat up to 320°F/160 °C. Please kindly note that the heat may change the hair style permanently. item.g:description:
Add volume and style with Caroline, a versatile wig designed with high quality for that flawless, invisible look. Why Choose Medical Wigs? ✅ Imagine hair that moves like yours—no stiffness, no awkward angles. Every strand in these wigs is hand-tied, one by one, so you can part it left, right, or center, just like natural hair. No more \"helmet head\" vibes. ✅ No glue? No problem. Silicone panels along the edges cling gently to your scalp—think of it like a soft hug that stays put through yoga sessions, windy walks, or chasing toddlers. Perfect if your skin’s feeling fragile or reactive. ✅ Worried about irritation or bacteria? These wigs are armored with Zeomic antimicrobial tech—like an invisible shield against icky stuff. Whether you’re healing post-surgery, managing eczema, or just have fussy skin, you can breathe easy. It’s not just hair. It’s confidence that feels safe, looks real, and lets you forget you’re wearing a wig at all.

However, it\'s important to note that due to the bleaching process involved, there may be occasional drawbacks - The lifespan of these wigs is shorter compared to regular human hair wigs. Additionally, they do require extra care and maintenance. 5 Tips to Care For and Maintain Colored Wigs
Use color-safe products to protect the vibrancy of your colored hair. Limit washing frequency to prevent color fading, and consider using dry shampoo. Protect your hair from heat damage by using heat protectant sprays and lower heat settings. Minimize exposure to sunlight, wear protective accessories, or use hair products with UV protection. Deep condition regularly to nourish and hydrate colored hair, using products specifically formulated for colored hair.
* As each piece is unique and entirely hand-dyed, there might be some slight color dye marks left on the inside of the cap. However, it\'s important to note that due to the bleaching process involved, there may be occasional drawbacks - The lifespan of these wigs is shorter compared to regular human hair wigs. Additionally, they do require extra care and maintenance. 5 Tips to Care For and Maintain Colored Wigs
Use color-safe products to protect the vibrancy of your colored hair. Limit washing frequency to prevent color fading, and consider using dry shampoo. Protect your hair from heat damage by using heat protectant sprays and lower heat settings. Minimize exposure to sunlight, wear protective accessories, or use hair products with UV protection. Deep condition regularly to nourish and hydrate colored hair, using products specifically formulated for colored hair.

Disclaimer
** Our colorist created wigs, skillfully designed by our talented colorists, are exquisite works of art. Each piece is thoughtfully processed to achieve the unique, custom look you desire. However, it\'s important to note that due to the bleaching process involved, there may be occasional drawbacks - The lifespan of these wigs is shorter compared to regular human hair wigs. Additionally, they do require extra care and maintenance. 5 Tips to Care For and Maintain Colored Wigs
Use color-safe products to protect the vibrancy of your colored hair. Limit washing frequency to prevent color fading, and consider using dry shampoo. Protect your hair from heat damage by using heat protectant sprays and lower heat settings. Minimize exposure to sunlight, wear protective accessories, or use hair products with UV protection. Deep condition regularly to nourish and hydrate colored hair, using products specifically formulated for colored hair. Always clean the cap construction after using products like gel, glue, or makeup. Leaving product residue on the cap can cause the hair to shed quickly.
* As each piece is unique and entirely hand-dyed, there might be some slight color dye marks left on the inside of the cap. This will not affect the coloring effects and the use of the wig. * We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images/videos of the products we carry and that appear on the website, but please understand the actual color may vary slightly from your monitor. What are the differences between Chinese hair and Burmese hair? 1. Texture:
Chinese hair is naturally wavy, smooth, and slightly coarse. Burmese hair has a wavy or curly texture after washing. Here is a video showing the natural texture of Burmese hair:
2. Durability: Chinese hair is more durable and often used in processed hair products. 3. Volume: Burmese hair offers more volume due to its coarser strands, making it ideal for fuller styles. Both types are suitable for different styling needs.

Additionally, they do require extra care and maintenance. 5 Tips to Care For and Maintain Colored Wigs
Use color-safe products to protect the vibrancy of your colored hair. Limit washing frequency to prevent color fading, and consider using dry shampoo. Protect your hair from heat damage by using heat protectant sprays and lower heat settings. Minimize exposure to sunlight, wear protective accessories, or use hair products with UV protection. Deep condition regularly to nourish and hydrate colored hair, using products specifically formulated for colored hair.
Always clean the cap construction after using products like gel, glue, or makeup. Leaving product residue on the cap can cause the hair to shed quickly.

6 Tips to Care For and Maintain Colored Wigs
Use color-safe products to maintain the vibrancy of your colored hair. Limit washing to prevent color fading—dry shampoo is a great alternative. Use heat protectant sprays and lower heat settings to avoid heat damage. Minimize sun exposure by wearing protective accessories or using hair products with UV protection. Deep condition regularly to nourish and hydrate your colored hair using products designed specifically for colored hair. Always clean the cap construction after using products like gel, glue, or makeup. Leaving product residue on the cap can cause the hair to shed and deteriorate quickly.

item.g:title: 7” x 8” Sylvia Grey Mono Top Human Hair Topper | With Pre-Cut Layers
item.g:description:
Introducing the 7” x 8” Sylvia Grey Mono Top Human Hair Topper — a perfect blend of timeless elegance, everyday comfort, and effortless style. This piece features UniWigs\' classic 7” x 8” mono base, known for its breathable construction and beginner-friendly fit. Each strand is meticulously hand-tied onto an ultra-thin monofilament base, creating the illusion of hair growing directly from your scalp. The hair topper offers flexible parting options and a comfortable, snug fit for all-day wear and confidence at any age.
Features: Classic Mono Base – Beginner-Friendly Comfortable Fit: The breathable mono base lays flat on the scalp and mimics natural hair growth for a seamless blend. Color Upgrade – More Natural Than Ever: Our new Sylvia Grey shade is a soft, elegant grey with subtle dimension—perfectly balanced to suit every age and skin tone. Lower Density – Lightweight Breathable: Redesigned with 110% low density for a feather-light, cooler wear without sacrificing coverage or style.
Effortlessly elegant and breathable, the Sylvia Grey Mono Topper offers natural coverage, upgraded color, and all-day comfort for any age!

item.g:title: PRE-ORDER | 7" X 8" Upgrade Courtney Mono Top Human Hair Topper | in 201R Permafrost
item.g:description: Back by popular demand and upgraded for UniWigs 13th Anniversary! Meet the enhanced 7\" x 8\" mono top human hair topper in shade 201R Permafrost—a beautiful blend of cool-toned blonde and natural gold blonde, shaded with pale brown for a dimensional, salon-fresh look. This upgraded version features our best-selling mono top base, offering a seamless blend and ultra-natural scalp effect. Each strand is meticulously hand-tied to an ultra-thin monolayer, allowing for flexible parting in any direction—from classic to modern styles. Crafted from premium human hair, this topper gives you styling freedom: straighten, curl, or add volume with ease. Whether you\'re looking to cover thinning areas or simply elevate your look, this is the go-to piece for effortless elegance. NOTE: This hair topper is made of 100% Burmese hair. Due to its natural texture, it may become wavy after washing and will require extra hydration and care to maintain its softness. Please kindly note: This item is not available for exchange or return. They are final sale!

item.g:title: PRE-ORDER | 7" X 8" Upgrade Courtney Mono Top Human Hair Topper | in Almond Frost & Light Permafrost
item.g:description: We’re bringing back your most-requested shades—now with an upgraded twist. Introducing the 7\" x 8\" mono top human hair topper in two timeless blonde blends: 01R Almond Frost and 672R Light Permafrost. These colors were customer favorites for a reason—and now they return exclusively for UniWigs 13th Anniversary celebration. Designed for maximum realism and comfort, this topper features a breathable mono top that mimics a natural scalp, with each strand hand-tied for a free-parting effect. Whether you\'re drawn to the sun-kissed dimension of Almond Frost or the chic ash tones of Light Permafrost, both options offer elegance and everyday wearability. Crafted with high-quality human hair, this piece allows you to style, curl, and straighten as you please. It’s the perfect solution for thinning hair, volume boost, or simply a fresh new look. NOTE: This hair topper is made of 100% Burmese hair. Due to its natural texture, it may become wavy after washing and will require extra hydration and care to maintain its softness. Please kindly note: This item is not available for exchange or return. They are final sale!

item.g:title: PRE-ORDER | 6.5” X 7” Airy Elegance | Ultra-Breathable Human Hair Topper | in 201R Permafrost
item.g:description: One of our most requested colors is back—now paired with our best-selling InstantGo Closed Lace Base. Meet the Airy Elegance: a 6.5\" x 7\" hair topper featuring a closed lace design for a breathable, invisible hairline—no glue, no hassle. Designed with a built-in halo wire for secure wear, this piece lays perfectly flat and allows you to create effortless ponytails and volume with confidence. The ultra-soft lace mimics the scalp beautifully, offering a realistic and natural blend. Made with 100% Burmese human hair, this topper is soft, lightweight, and versatile—style it straight or embrace the soft wave that may appear after washing. The fan-favorite 201R Permafrost shade—a sophisticated blend of cool-toned blonde and pale brown root—is now available in this upgraded format, exclusively for UniWigs 13th Anniversary. NOTE: This hair topper is made of 100% Burmese hair. Due to its natural texture, it may become wavy after washing and will require extra hydration and care to maintain its softness. Please kindly note: This item is not available for exchange or return. They are final sale!

item.g:title: Natalie | Smoky Hazelnut Remy Human Hair Lace Front Wig S/M
item.g:description:
Natalie is a modern, sophisticated wig crafted with 100% Remy human hair for a silky, natural look and feel. The Smokey Hazelnut shade blends a soft brunette base with cool, smoky undertones and subtle highlights, adding depth and dimension. Designed with a lace front cap, it offers a seamless, realistic hairline, while the S/M size ensures a secure, comfortable fit for all-day wear. Perfect for elevating both everyday style and special occasions.
** The Natalie wig air dries naturally wavy or curly. Due to the nature of real Burmese human hair, the hair pattern might vary after washing and air-drying. Some may appear wavy, while others may appear curly. Please note that due to the natural texture of the Burmese hair, it will require a little more maintenance including additional hydration. Use heat protectant sprays and lower heat settings to avoid heat damage. Minimize sun exposure by wearing protective accessories or using hair products with UV protection. Deep condition regularly to nourish and hydrate your colored hair using products designed specifically for colored hair. Always clean the cap construction after using products like gel, glue, or makeup. Leaving product residue on the cap can cause the hair to shed and deteriorate quickly.
*As each piece is unique and entirely hand-dyed, there might be some slight color dye marks left on the inside of the cap. This will not affect the coloring effects and the use of the wig. * We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images/videos of the products we carry and that appear on the website, but please understand the actual color may vary slightly from your monitor. We cannot guarantee that what you see accurately portrays the color of the actual wig.

item.g:title: 3” x 4” Velora Lace Top Human Hair Topper | Ultra Breathable
item.g:description:
Introducing the 3’’x 4’’ Velora Full Lace Hand-Tied Human Hair Topper — a refined solution for those seeking lightweight coverage, natural volume, and exceptional comfort. Thoughtfully designed for early-stage hair loss, it blends seamlessly with your natural hair to enhance fullness and conceal wide part lines with ease. Key Features: Lightweight Natural Fit: The compact 3’’x4’’ fully hand-tied lace base offers a featherlight feel, perfect for early-stage hair loss, wider part lines, or anyone looking to add subtle volume at the crown. Breathable Comfort: The hand-tied lace construction promotes airflow, ensuring a cool and comfortable wear throughout the day. Premium Human Hair: Crafted from 100% human hair for softness, shine, and versatility—style it just as you would your own hair with curling, straightening, or coloring. Elevate your everyday look with a topper that combines luxury, comfort, and confidence—making it an effortless choice for natural, flawless coverage.

item.g:title: Color Me | Platinum Blonde Premium Remy Human Hair Lace Front Wig
item.g:description: Made with hand-selected 100% remy human hair, Color Me is a perfect platinum blonde lace front wig that can be colored and styled. item.g:title: 5.5"x5.5" Claire | Mono Top Remy Human Hair Topper | Lace Front
item.g:description:
Claire is a supremely natural hairpiece. Claire is designed to add natural volume at the crown with a lightweight, breathable feel. The pre-cut lace front creates a seamless hairline, while the monofilament top allows for flexible parting and a scalp-like appearance. Made with 100% fine human hair, Claire blends effortlessly with your own and can be styled with heat tools. Four pressure-sensitive clips ensure a secure, comfortable fit for all-day wear. SPECIAL FEATURES
Lace Front for a realistic hairline and styling versatility
Monofilament Top for natural-looking parting
100% Human Hair for heat styling and long-lasting quality
Secure Clip Design for stable, lightweight wear
EXPERT TIPS STYLING IDEAS
The lace front is a delicate material and should be handled with care.
How to Wear:
Style your hair Place the topper on the area you want to add more hair volume. Fix the front part with a comb Blend your hair with the top form and style it. Your look is complete.
Hair Topper 101:
Different Base Types How to Choose Hair Color How to Choose Base Size

item.g:title: 8.5” X 9” Kinsley Long Layered Mono Top Human Hair Topper | Lace front | 22”
item.g:description:
Kinsley is a premium clip-in hair topper designed for those in the progressive to advanced stages of hair loss. It features an undetectable lace front for a natural-looking hairline and a monofilament base that allows for multi-directional parting, giving you the freedom to style as you wish. With its extra-large base, Kinsley provides full coverage and blends seamlessly with your own hair. The pre-cut, face-framing layers add soft volume and dimension, enhancing your overall look in seconds. Wear it straight out of the box with a sweeping front, or customize it with bangs to suit your style.
Special Features:
Lace Front + Monofilament Base—Creates a natural hairline and realistic scalp appearance with versatile parting
22” Human Hair—Long, luxurious length that adds volume and styling freedom

It features an undetectable lace front for a natural-looking hairline and a monofilament base that allows for multi-directional parting, giving you the freedom to style as you wish. With its extra-large base, Kinsley provides full coverage and blends seamlessly with your own hair. The pre-cut, face-framing layers add soft volume and dimension, enhancing your overall look in seconds. Wear it straight out of the box with a sweeping front, or customize it with bangs to suit your style.
Special Features:
Lace Front + Monofilament Base—Creates a natural hairline and realistic scalp appearance with versatile parting
22” Human Hair—Long, luxurious length that adds volume and styling freedom

item.g:title: 9” X 9” Savannah Silk Top Human Hair Topper
item.g:description:
Savannah 9\" x 9\" Human Hair Topper | Silk Top The Savannah Topper is crafted with 100% premium Burmese human hair and features a generous 9\" x 9\" base for maximum coverage at the top and crown. Soft, face-framing layers create natural movement, while a discreet front comb ensures a secure and comfortable fit. Blending seamlessly with your own hair, Savannah delivers a full, realistic look with effortless style. Key Features:
100% Human Hair – Heat-style with curling irons, straighteners, or blow dryers, just like your own hair. Silk Top (4.25\" x 4.25\") – Creates the look of a natural scalp with versatile parting options.
Please Note: Savannah is made from 100% Burmese human hair. Due to the natural texture, the hair may develop a wavy pattern after washing.

item.g:title: 5.5"x5.5" Claire | Mono Top Remy Human Hair Topper | Lace Front
item.g:description:
Claire is a supremely natural hairpiece. Claire is designed to add natural volume at the crown with a lightweight, breathable feel. The pre-cut lace front creates a seamless hairline, while the monofilament top allows for flexible parting and a scalp-like appearance. Made with 100% fine human hair, Claire blends effortlessly with your own and can be styled with heat tools. Four pressure-sensitive clips ensure a secure, comfortable fit for all-day wear. SPECIAL FEATURES
Lace Front for a realistic hairline and styling versatility
Monofilament Top for natural-looking parting
100% Human Hair for heat styling and long-lasting quality
Secure Clip Design for stable, lightweight wear
EXPERT TIPS STYLING IDEAS
The lace front is a delicate material and should be handled with care.
How to Wear:
Style your hair Place the topper on the area you want to add more hair volume. Fix the front part with a comb Blend your hair with the top form and style it. Your look is complete.
Hair Topper 101:
Different Base Types How to Choose Hair Color How to Choose Base Size

item.g:title: 6" X 6" Amber Silk Top Remy Human Hair Topper
item.g:description:
The 6\"*6\" Amber topper is a clip in hair topper that adds seamless volume and coverage on the top of the head and along the part. It features silk top which makes the knots 100% invisible and gives the illusion that the hair is actually growing out of your scalp. It is made of 100% human hair and can be heat-styled with a flat iron or curling iron with your hair creating the perfect integration.
100% Human Hair: allows you to style the pieces just like your own hair to make blending flawless Silk Top Base: gives the appearance of your own natural scalp Pressure sensitive clips: easy to apply, secure, lightweight, non-damaging, and non-permanent.
* Please be aware that the Amber silk hair topper includes hair return.

item.g:title: 3”x 3" Full Skin Base Human Hair Patch Kit | With Tapes
item.g:description: UniWigs Invisible Cover-up Hair Patch is a great option if you want to add some volume to a specific area of your head, or cover-up the small bald spots. This collection is developed to provide a natural-looking, simple-to-use, and readily available solution for individuals suffering from hair loss. 3”x 3\" Full Skin Base Human Hair Patch Kit will come with a bag of waterproof ultra-hold tapes.

Say Goodbye to Thinning Hairlines! Introducing our 6\"x6\" Amber silk hair topper with bangs, designed to add volume and coverage to your hair with ease. Made from 100% human hair, this clip-in topper is perfect for those looking to boost their confidence and achieve a more natural-looking hairline. What Sets Us Apart:
100% Human Hair: Style the hair just like your own for a natural look and feel Silk Top Base: Creates the illusion of a natural scalp for a seamless blend Pressure Sensitive Clips: Easy to apply, secure, lightweight, non-damaging, and non-permanent Bangs: Avoids an unnatural hairline for a more natural look
* Please be aware that the Amber silk hair topper includes hair return. HAIR TOPPER 101 INFOS

item.g:title: Hair Topper Beginner Fit Kit - Only for Color and Base Matching
item.g:description: Introducing UniWigs Hair Topper Fit Kit, the essential tool for a seamless hair topper experience! We highly recommend that all our valued customers invest in this fit kit before placing their hair topper order. The fit kit includes three different bases, allowing you to try out different options and find the perfect fit that blends seamlessly with your natural hair. With options to choose from, you can be confident in making the right decision. They are a 5.5\" x 5.5\" Claire mono base (SKU: P25001), a 7\" x 8\" Upgrade Courtney mono base (SKU: PM2303), and a 9\" x 9\" Savannah silk base (SKU: PS2240). Additionally, we understand that color matching is crucial for a flawless look. That\'s why we\'ve included a color sample in the fit kit. You can try it against your own hair to ensure a perfect match, enhancing the overall natural appearance. To make the process even more convenient for you, we offer a hassle-free return policy for the fit kit. Once you\'ve tried the bases and color samples, simply send back the fit kit to us. If you decide to proceed with placing a hair topper order, we will process a full refund for the fit kit amount. Don\'t compromise on your hair topper experience. Invest in our Hair Topper Fit Kit and embark on your journey to finding the ideal match that will boost your confidence and transform your look. Order now and take the first step towards a flawless hair topper experience!

item.g:title: 7.5” x 7.5” Upgrade Aura Skin Top Human Hair Topper
item.g:description:
The Upgrade Aura Skin Top Topper is designed to offer a natural scalp look, flexible parting, and reliable coverage. With its 4\'\' x 5\'\' skin top base, it provides a realistic appearance and allows you to adjust the part to your preference. Key Features:
Skin Top Base (4\'\' x 5\'\'): Creates a natural scalp-like look with versatile parting options. Generous Base Size: Offers fuller coverage for a seamless and confident style. 100% Burmese Human Hair: Premium quality hair that can be heat-styled into your desired look.
Perfect for those seeking an affordable, high-quality topper with natural finish and styling versatility. Please note: Burmese hair has a natural texture and may develop soft waves after washing. Extra care and hydration are recommended to maintain softness and manageability.

item.g:title: Hair Topper Beginner Fit Kit - Only for Color and Base Matching
item.g:description: Introducing UniWigs Hair Topper Fit Kit, the essential tool for a seamless hair topper experience! We highly recommend that all our valued customers invest in this fit kit before placing their hair topper order. The fit kit includes three different bases, allowing you to try out different options and find the perfect fit that blends seamlessly with your natural hair. With options to choose from, you can be confident in making the right decision. They are a 5.5\" x 5.5\" Claire mono base (SKU: P25001), a 7\" x 8\" Upgrade Courtney mono base (SKU: PM2303), and a 9\" x 9\" Savannah silk base (SKU: PS2240). Additionally, we understand that color matching is crucial for a flawless look. That\'s why we\'ve included a color sample in the fit kit. You can try it against your own hair to ensure a perfect match, enhancing the overall natural appearance. To make the process even more convenient for you, we offer a hassle-free return policy for the fit kit. Once you\'ve tried the bases and color samples, simply send back the fit kit to us. If you decide to proceed with placing a hair topper order, we will process a full refund for the fit kit amount. Don\'t compromise on your hair topper experience. Invest in our Hair Topper Fit Kit and embark on your journey to finding the ideal match that will boost your confidence and transform your look. Order now and take the first step towards a flawless hair topper experience!

item.g:title: 10" Instant Clip In Human Hair Curtain Bang | No Track Cover-up Hair Patch | Hair Pieces | Two Pieces
item.g:description:
This product provided as gifts are not eligible for exchange.
Looking to boost volume in a specific spot or cover up a thinning area? UniWigs Invisible Cover-up Patch is your go-to solution for quick, natural-looking enhancement—no salon visit required. How to Use:
Curtain Bangs Effect: Clip near your parting to add soft volume and layers, creating a natural curtain bang look.
Spot Coverage: Perfect for covering small bald spots or thinning patches with ease and discretion.
Root Lifter: Clip underneath your top layer of hair for an instant lift at the roots—hello, volume!

item.g:title: 5" x 7" SilkEssence | Full Hand-tied Silk Human Hair Topper
item.g:description:
UniWigs SilkEssence Hair Topper is made from 100% Super Human Hair, which can be styled with heat styling tools. This 5”x 7” Human Hair top piece is designed to add natural hair volume and offer coverage for hair loss spots at the top of the head. The 100% hand tied, full silk base can provide multi-directional styling with the most realistic look, creating the appearance of natural hair growth.
100% Human Hair: Offers the most natural look and feel, it can be styled with heat tools like your own hair. Full Silk Base: Creates the illusion of natural hair growth where the hair is parted and allows you to part the hair in any direction. Breathable Lightweight – Ideal for daily wear with a comfortable fit
* The product may feature a small yellow mark on the base edge, a normal aspect of production. Rest assured, it will not affect your wearing experience.

item.g:title: Hair Building Fibers | Must-have for Hair Topper Blending | Instant Fullness for Thinning Hair
item.g:description:
UniWigs Hair Building Fibers offers a revolutionary solution for instantly enhancing hair volume and density. Crafted from ultra-fine milled plant-based fibers, this formula binds effortlessly to existing hair, delivering a seamless, clump-free finish that mirrors the appearance of natural hair. These fibers are designed for everyday use and are ideal for both men and women. They seamlessly blend with natural hair and can be used alongside hair toppers, ensuring a smooth and virtually undetectable transition.
Instant Coverage Natural Look: Fills in thinning areas and conceals hair loss effectively, creating a look of thick and full hair. Versatile Application: Perfect for adding overall volume or as a precise root touch-up to seamlessly blend with your hair topper.
Tips: To ensure the safety of the ingredients, this hair fiber is not waterproof or wind-resistant. We recommend spraying a bit of hair setting spray on your hair before using the hair fiber to enhance its adhesion for a longer-lasting effect. This product only includes the hair fiber and does not come with a spray applicator. If you need a spray applicator, it must be purchased separately.
COLOR MATCH SHEET
Fiber Color
Hair Topper Color
Black NB,G-1B,T1B-246
Dark Brown 211,672R,224R,201R,16R,01R,624R,512R
Medium Brown 674R,660R,G246,223R,210,EM4,H10R,8T25,G-4,626R
Light Brown 8
Blonde 24-613
Medium Blonde 803
Grey 705

item.g:title: Hair Building Fibers | Must-have for Hair Topper Blending | Instant Fullness for Thinning Hair
item.g:description:
UniWigs Hair Building Fibers offers a revolutionary solution for instantly enhancing hair volume and density. Crafted from ultra-fine milled plant-based fibers, this formula binds effortlessly to existing hair, delivering a seamless, clump-free finish that mirrors the appearance of natural hair. These fibers are designed for everyday use and are ideal for both men and women. They seamlessly blend with natural hair and can be used alongside hair toppers, ensuring a smooth and virtually undetectable transition.
Instant Coverage Natural Look: Fills in thinning areas and conceals hair loss effectively, creating a look of thick and full hair. Versatile Application: Perfect for adding overall volume or as a precise root touch-up to seamlessly blend with your hair topper.
Tips: To ensure the safety of the ingredients, this hair fiber is not waterproof or wind-resistant. We recommend spraying a bit of hair setting spray on your hair before using the hair fiber to enhance its adhesion for a longer-lasting effect. This product only includes the hair fiber and does not come with a spray applicator. If you need a spray applicator, it must be purchased separately.
COLOR MATCH SHEET
Fiber Color
Hair Topper Color

Medium Brown 674R,660R,G246,223R,210,EM4,H10R,8T25,G-4,626R

item.g:title: 7" x 8" Upgrade Courtney Mono Top Remy Human Hair Topper | With Pre-cut Layers| Chinese Hair
item.g:description:
This is the Chinese hair version of PM2303. Introducing our upgraded Courtney mono top remy human hair topper—a perfect blend of style and versatility. With a larger mono-hand-tied area, you can part your hair in any direction you choose.The redesigned 7\" x 8\" topper offers a natural, seamless look that blends effortlessly with your own hair. Each strand is knotted onto the ultra-thin mono material, creating the illusion of hair growing directly from your scalp.This topper allows for various parting styles, from classic to trendy, and is made from high-quality human hair for a realistic, comfortable finish. Style, curl, and straighten with ease, and enjoy the confidence and style a customizable part brings. Whether for hair loss or added volume, this topper is the ultimate solution. What are the differences between Chinese hair and Burmese hair? 1. Texture:
Chinese hair is naturally wavy, smooth, and slightly coarse. Burmese hair has a wavy or curly texture after washing. Here is a video showing the natural texture of Burmese hair:
2. Durability: Chinese hair is more durable and often used in processed hair products. 3. Volume: Burmese hair offers more volume due to its coarser strands, making it ideal for fuller styles. Both types are suitable for different styling needs.

item.g:title: 1.5" x 11" Evelyn Ultra-Breathable Full Lace Human Hair Hairline Topper |Halo Wire| 10"
item.g:description:
UniWigs Evelyn Hairline Topper is your ultimate choice for a natural hairline! The 1.5\" x 11\" Evelyn Ultra-Breathable Full Lace Human Hair Hairline Topper with Halo Wire provides flawless coverage with superior comfort and support. Made with Swiss lace for a seamless blend, silicone panels for a secure fit, and halo wire for extra support, this topper enhances your hairline and adds natural volume. Key Features:
Natural Hairline: The Swiss lace base and high-quality human hair create an ultra-realistic scalp effect, ensuring a flawless blend with your natural hair. Secure Fit: Silicone panels combined with halo wire provide a secure, all-day fit without shifting. Breathable: Fearless of sweat, enjoy all-day comfort with effortless airflow.
Achieve the most natural, stunning hairline with the Evelyn Ultra-Breathable Hairline Topper. Feel the difference with a topper that blends so perfectly, it’s like a second natural hairline! NOTE: This hair topper is made of 100% Burmese hair. Due to its natural texture, it may become wavy after washing and will require extra hydration and care to maintain its softness.

item.g:title: 6.5” x 7” Airy Elegance | Ultra-breathable Lace Top Human Hair Topper With Lace Front | Ponytail Topper|Low Density
item.g:description:
Discover the SwissLuxe Lace Hair Topper Collection by UniWigs – designed for those experiencing hair thinning, especially during warmer months. Discover the Airy Elegance Human Hair Topper, a 6.5” x 7” piece made from luxurious Swiss lace with large mesh holes for enhanced breathability. Experience relief from the summer heat as it keeps your scalp cool and dry.
The top-quality SwissLuxe lace is soft and blends invisibly with your scalp for a natural hairline. This hair topper is made of 100% Burmese hair, which means it might turn wavy after washing. Available in 12\",14\"and 16\" lengths and with a density of 120%, the Airy Elegance provides fullness and perfect coverage for thinning at the crown.
NOTE: Due to the soft, handmade lace base, slight size variations may occur, and it may not perfectly fit every head shape. Some customers may notice minor lifting at the front hairline, so we recommend using adhesive or tape for a more secure fit.
